# ============================================================= Target ============================================================= #

# Add library
add_library(gsl-lite INTERFACE)

# #============================================================ Sources ============================================================ #

# Add project code
target_include_directories(gsl-lite
    INTERFACE
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/include
)
